SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.geolocation

Interface IPGenerator

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseIPGenerator, GeoIP2IPGenerator
public interface IPGenerator
Generates random IPs from specified countries.
Author:
nikolay.grozev

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Set<String>
    getCountryCodes()
    Returns the ISO codes of the countries for which this generator generates IPs.

    Creates a random IP from the specified countries.

  • Method Details

    • getCountryCodes

      Set<String> getCountryCodes()
      Returns the ISO codes of the countries for which this generator generates IPs.
      Returns:
      the ISO codes of the countries for which this generator generates IPs.

    • pollRandomIP

      String pollRandomIP()
      Creates a random IP from the specified countries. This may be either IPv4 or IPv6. The returned values is in the standard dot notation. If no IP could be generated, null is returned.
      Returns:
      a random IP from the specified countries or null, if no value could be generated.

    • pollRandomIP

      String pollRandomIP(IGeolocationService service, int attempts)
      Creates a random IP from the specified countries. Sometimes the origins of IPs of an IPGenerator and an IGeolocationService may be different - e.g. different data bases. In such cases generating an IP from this generator, may not have the same metadata in a given service. This method repeatedly generates IPs until an IP which is in the desired location according to the service is found.
      Parameters:
      service - - the service, with which the IP will be checked. Must not be null.
      attempts - - maximum unsuccessful attempts to poll IPs. If -1 IPs are polled until success.
      Returns:
      a random IP from the specified countries, according to the specified service, or null, if no value could be generated.
